a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(int(round((a + b) / 2)))


a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(int(round((a + b) / 2.0)))


a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(int((a + b) / 2))
a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(int((a + b + 1) / 2))


a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(round((a + b) / 2))

a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(int((a + b + 1) / 2))

a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(int((a + b + 1) / 2))


a, b = map(int, input().split(' '))

print(int((a + b + 1) / 2))
#

a, b = map(int, input().split())  # 두 수를 입력받아 a, b에 넣기
print(int(round((a + b) / 2)))  # a와 b의 평균을 출력


a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(int((a + b + 1) / 2)) 


a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())

print(int(round(((a + b + c + d) / 4))))


a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(int(round((a + b) / 2.0)))
